GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

topics.description: The man, the Mitch, the legend

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an individual article by article_id passed into the parametric endpoint

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments that are related to the specific article_id given

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a new comment to the database and serves the added comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates an existing article by the votes property and then serves the single updated article. Example request: { inc_votes: 10 }

GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of all users

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment based on the comment_id integer passed into parametric endpoint, no response given
